DOC.brief_title: Study Efficacy Induction Chemotherapy With Gemcitabine Carboplatin Operable Non-small-cell Lung Cancer Before Surgery
DOC.criteria: Histologically cytologically proven , newly diagnose primary bronchogenic nonsmall cell lung cancer Measurable evaluable tumour chest Xray CT scan . No multiple ipsilateral contralateral parenchymal tumour Stage I ( exceptT1N0 ) , II , IIIa disease show PETCT
